org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui

Class GuiHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui.GuiHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.network.IGuiHandler

    public class GuiHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.minecraftforge.fml.common.network.IGuiHandler
    The handler class that will map Containers to GUI's.

      • setTemporaryData

        public <O> void setTemporaryData(GuiHandler.GuiType<O> guiType,
                                 O data)
        Set a temporary object for showing gui's of a certain type. This temporary object will be removed once a gui/container is opened once.
        Type Parameters:
        O - The type of temporary data.
        Parameters:
        guiType - The type of gui.
        data - The data for this gui type.
